name: Oh Deer God
description:
Created by Team ZEAL ( Zach Wheeler, Eran Limor, And Linden Krouse )  for the 2015 NHTI Game Jam.

'Oh, Deer God' is a point-and-click adventure based on the Geovikkan lore from Kuu. You play as a displaced young girl living in the otherworld. Finding herself alone, she wanders the nether, fending off beasts and trying to find her way home.

Controls

ControlAction Left ClickMove Right ClickInteract SpacebarChange sprite I or TabInventory`~debug (if stuck)

Note: to start a new game, delete the "content\save" folder.

Note: Requires at least .NET Framework 4.0
